attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Blair - honour your comments made onboard HMS ALBION - allow the finest Royal Navy to once again rule the waves (It doesn't anymore - if you didn't know).  The Royal Navy is in danger of becoming a coastal defence force if investment is not increased.

rejection.details: Please re-draft without all the CAPITALS as they it hard for people to read
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
